name: You want to listen to the DK Rap, right?
name_original: You want to listen to the DK Rap, right?
description:
You want to listen to the DK Rap, right? is a game developed by nosmallcaterpillar. It was originally released in 2022.
You want to listen to the DK Rap, right? is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
